definition.name: NXcg_triangulated_surface_mesh

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

definition.doc:
Computational geometry description of a mesh of triangles.
The mesh may be self-intersecting and have holes but the triangles must not be degenerated.

group.doc: A graph-based approach to describe the mesh when it is also desired to perform topological processing or analyses on the mesh.
